Articles.Content:
Hi guys

I haven't done much for a while, and have limited time these days, but this seemed like too cool a thing to be left in my imagination:

Just a bit of fun, really! I can get the model finished and textured, but the IVA prop stuff is all new to me, so I was wondering if anyone with some experience fancies picking that part of the project up? As you can see, it's not an external command seat; I'm using JSITransparentPod. I've not seen much 'open cockpit' stuff done this way, so thought I'd give it a go. It can, of course, be easily configured as an external command seat for those that might want it to work that way. Thinking the back ought to be some kind of container or something.. General thoughts welcome!

Are you thinking about making custom IVA props, or just getting the config for them? I've got a decent amount of experience doing both, but I'm not sure I could commit that much time, at least until I get NavUtils updated for 1.0

Either way would be cool I haven't even played much IVA myself, so I've not really got much idea what's available or how to set up.

This will be a slow burn for me too, so no hurry this end! I'll get a WIP package posted so you can have a play around if you feel like it.
